alert.note: Alert for Caswell; Rockingham (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 21 at 1:18PM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Rockingham and southwestern Caswell Counties through 145 PM EDT... At 118 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles southwest of Monroeton, or 9 miles north of Greensboro, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Reidsville... Wentworth... Camp Springs... Oregon Hill... Harrisons Crossroads... Lawsonville... and Monroeton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for north central North Carolina...and south central Virginia.
